how_to_move_pawn_desc: Pawn moves forward one square at a time
From starting position, can move two squares forward
When reaching the last rank, promotes to any piece (except king)
how_to_move_rook_desc: Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_knight_desc: Knight moves in an 'L' shape - two squares forward and one to the side
Can only move to squares of the opposite color
Captures enemy pieces, moving to their place
how_to_move_bishop_desc: Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_queen_desc: Queen moves horizontally, vertically, and diagonally
Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_king_desc: King moves one square in any direction
Cannot move to a square that puts it in check
Cannot move to a square that is already occupied by a friendly piece
Cannot move to a square that is already occupied by an enemy piece
learn_how_to_play_with_pieces: Learn how to play with pieces:
puzzles_mate_in_one_1_desc: White to move and checkmate in one.
puzzles_mate_in_one_1_hint: Look for a back rank mate.
puzzles_mate_in_two_1_desc: White to move and checkmate in two.
puzzles_mate_in_two_1_hint: Start with a check and use all your pieces.
puzzles_basic_tactics_1_desc: White to move and win material.
puzzles_basic_tactics_1_hint: Look for a fork with the knight.
name: Name
easy_kids_5_6: Computer makes many mistakes, shows hints and supports emojis
medium_kids_7_10: Computer plays a bit better but still makes simple moves
hard_advanced: Full power of chess engine for experienced players
auth.rate_limited: Too many login attempts. Please try again later
network.connection_error: Connection error. Please check your internet connection
api.server_error: Server error. Please try again later
test_case_1_title: Test Case 1: Kids Mode (Should show only hints toggle button)
test_case_2_title: Test Case 2: Normal Mode (Should show no buttons)
test_case_3_title: Test Case 3: Kids Mode with Threat Highlighting Disabled
test_case_1_behavior_1: Only one button should be visible: "üëÅÔ∏è Show hints" or "üôà Hide hints"
test_case_1_behavior_2: NO "üîç Check threats" button should be present
test_case_1_behavior_3: Automatic threat highlighting should work when pieces are under attack
test_case_1_behavior_4: Threat warning messages should appear when threats are detected
test_case_2_behavior_1: No buttons should be visible above the chessboard
test_case_2_behavior_3: No threat warning messages should appear
test_case_3_behavior_1: Only hints toggle button should be visible
test_case_3_behavior_2: No threat highlighting should occur (even in kids mode)
test_case_3_behavior_3: No threat warning messages should appear
instruction_1_1: Verify only the hints toggle button is present
instruction_1_2: Click the hints button to toggle between "Show hints" and "Hide hints"
instruction_1_3: Make moves that create threats and verify automatic highlighting works
instruction_1_4: Check that threat warning messages appear when pieces are under attack
instruction_2_1: Verify no buttons are displayed above the chessboard
instruction_2_2: Make moves and verify no threat highlighting occurs
instruction_3_1: Verify hints button is present but no threat highlighting occurs
success_criteria_1: All test cases pass the expected behavior checks
success_criteria_2: No "üîç Check threats" button appears in any configuration
success_criteria_3: Automatic threat analysis continues to work without manual button
kids_mode_settings_info: ‚ÑπÔ∏è In kids mode, settings are optimized for learning.
kids_mode_change_difficulty: To change difficulty, return to level selection.
single_threat_hint: Your piece is under attack! Defend it or move it to safety.
multiple_threats_hint: {{count}} of your pieces are under attack! Be careful!
setting_depth_description: Number of half-moves to analyze position
setting_time_description: Maximum thinking time per move in milliseconds
setting_multipv_description: How many best moves the engine analyzes simultaneously
setting_threads_description: Number of CPU threads for calculation
setting_kids_mode_description: Enables simplified logic and hints for children
setting_last_move_arrow_description: Show arrow of the last made move
